Verbatim Marketing Claim: TOTAL30® contact lenses that feel like nothing, even at day 30.
Reference: In a clinical study wherein patients (n=66) used AOSEPT solution for nightly cleaning, disinfecting, and storing; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: The first and only monthly replacement Water Gradient contact lenses.
Reference: Surface property analysis of lehfilcon A lenses out of pack and after 30 days of wear; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: TOTAL30® contact lenses feature a gradual transition in water content, from 55 % at the core to nearly 100 % water at the outermost surface.
Reference:
1. In vitro analysis of lens oxygen permeability, water content, and surface imaging; Alcon data on file, 2021. 

2. In vitro analysis of lehfilcon A contact lenses outermost surface softness and correlation with water content; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: Water Gradient Technology in TOTAL30 contact lenses lasts for a full 30 days.
Reference:
1. Surface property analysis of lehfilcon A lenses out of pack and after 30 days of wear; Alcon data on file, 2021. 
2. Surface observations of lehfilcon A contact lens and human cornea using scanning transmissions electron microscopy; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: CELLIGENT® Technology creates a dynamic lens surface that biomimics the corneal surface.
Reference:
1. Shi X, Cantu-Crouch D, Sharma V, et al. Surface characterization of a silicone hydrogel contact lens having bioinspired 2-methacryloyloxyethyl phosphorylcholine polymer layer in hydrated state. Colloids Surf B: Biointerfaces. March 2021;199:111539.
2. Surface observations of lehfilcon A contact lens and human cornea using scanning transmissions electron microscopy; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: Helps resist the adherence of bacteria and lipids for a clean lens.
Reference: In vitro evaluation of bacterial biofilm in commercial lenses; Alcon data on file, 2020.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: Water Gradient delivers superior softness and superior lubricity vs. leading reusable lenses.
Reference:
1. Laboratory analysis of surface modulus of lehfilcon A and commercial lenses using atomic force microscope; Alcon data on file, 2021.
2. Surface lubricity testing of lehfilcon A and commercial lenses using nano-tribometer; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: Class 1 UV Blocking delivers the highest level of UV protection available in a monthly replacement lens.
Reference: Laboratory assessment of ultraviolet and visible light transmission properties of lehfilcon A contact lenses using spectrophotometer; Alcon data on file, 2020.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: The first and only monthly replacement Water Gradient toric contact lenses.
Reference:
1. Shi X, Cantu-Crouch D, Sharma V, et al. Surface characterization of a silicone hydrogel contact lens having bioinspired 2-methacryloyloxyethyl phosphorylcholine polymer layer in hydrated state. Colloids Surf B: Biointerfaces. March 2021;199:111539.

2. Surface property analysis of lehfilcon A lenses out of pack and after 30 days of wear; Alcon data on file, 2021.

3. Surface observations of lehfilcon A contact lens and human cornea using scanning transmissions electron microscopy; Alcon data on file, 2021.

Verbatim Marketing Claim: TOTAL30 delivers the only Water Gradient, reusable lens that is clinically shown to feel like nothing, even on day 30.
Reference: In a clinical study wherein patients (n=66) used CLEAR CARE solution for nightly cleaning, disinfecting, and storing; Alcon data on file, 2021.
